sentences.sContent: In conjunction with LIFE.com, we bring you a list of the gifts that you should avoid as much as that next glass of eggnog you're considering right now.
sentences.sContent_eng: In conjunction with LIFE.com, we bring you a list of the gifts that you should avoid as much as that next glass of eggnog you're considering right now.
sentences.sCn: 但，有些礼物是绝对不应该出现在圣诞树下的，我们和《生活》网站，联合评选出一个送礼最应回避的名单，就像你此刻不应该再多喝一杯蛋酒一样。

synos.tran: 结合；[语]连接词；同时发生

words.tran: 事态；紧要关头；同时发生

trans.tranOther: a combination of different things that have come together by chance
